manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_quickcenter_module_bindings` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `weid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `groupid` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '分组名称', `identifier` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '菜单标示符', `pidentifier` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '上级菜单标示符', `displayorder` INT(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '显示顺序', `title` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `url` VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, `thumb` VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, `module` VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, `do` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '打开按钮的跳转链接', `callback` VARCHAR(10240) NOT NULL, `rich_callback_enable` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `enable` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
